content: looking for the perfect winter project my warm woolen hat has got you covered crafted from the bottom-up this crochet creation needs minimal seaming and offers a wonderfully textured end-product and the best part you can pair it up with the matching scarf pattern for the ultimate crochet set happy hooking third hat of the month club cal pattern for 2024 > this pattern will be available as a > free pdf download until march 25 2024 > at 11 59 pm est new york time 23 59 > est for cal participants simply add > the pattern to your cart before 11 59 > pm est on march 25th and it will show > as $0 00 the free pattern will be available on my blog beginning on march 24 2024 at 9 00 pm est new york time 21 00 est > this pattern is available for free on > my blog which is monetized by ads if > you prefer an ad-free version of the > pattern it is available to purchase > right here on ravelry ♥ rhondda instagram https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ instagram reels https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/reels/ tiktok https //www tiktok com/@oombawkadesigncrochet pinterest https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ youtube https //www youtube com/oombawkadesigncrochet facebook https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ newsletter https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter © 2012-2024 designed by rhondda mol oombawka design crochet all rights reserved you may sell finished items you crochet from this pattern no part of this publication may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from rhondda mol
